featured.text: Some kindergartens have adopted teaching methods along blood group lines, and even major companies reportedly make decisions about assignments based on an employee’s blood type.
At the beginning of the semester, the teacher told the students that late assignments would receive a low grade as a _____.

definition.zh_def: 指派或分配的任務或工作。
definition.en_def: A task or piece of work assigned to someone as part of a job or course of study.
definition.example: The teacher gave us a challenging assignment to complete by next week.
